message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you our premium product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a fair offer to you. I'll sell it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that budget is a concern, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1150000. It's a great compromise that still reflects the value of the product, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1000000. However, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $1075000. It's a fair price that still reflects the value of the product, and I think you'll be happy with the compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still trying to get as close to my target price as possible. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value I'll get from it, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
